net.wimpi.modbus.io
Class ModbusASCIITransport

java.lang.Object
  net.wimpi.modbus.io.ModbusASCIITransport
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModbusSerialTransport, ModbusTransport
public class ModbusASCIITransport
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModbusSerialTransport

Class that implements the Modbus/ASCII transport flavor.

Version:
1.1 (08/06/2004)
Author:
Dieter Wimberger, John Charlton

prepareStreams

public void prepareStreams(java.io.InputStream in,
                           java.io.OutputStream out)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Prepares the input and output streams of this ModbusASCIITransport instance. The raw input stream will be wrapped into a filtered DataInputStream.

Specified by:
prepareStreams in interface ModbusSerialTransport
Parameters:
in - the input stream to be used for reading.
out - the output stream to be used for writing.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I\O related error occurs.

readEcho

public boolean readEcho(int timeOut)
                 throws ModbusIOException
Reads the own message echo produced in RS485 Echo Mode within the given time frame.

Parameters:
timeOut - the time frame for reading the echo.
Returns:
true if read successfully, false otherwise.
Throws:
ModbusIOException - if a Modbus I/O error occurred.
